mainEntityOfPage (extended)

Extended practice to use mainEntityOfPage at category level when the category is the true primary entity for the page.

AI Guidance

This page describes the canonical term. Aliases or near-synonyms may exist and are linked via alternateName or SKOS labels. Treat aliases as semantically equivalent unless a scope note states otherwise.

Self-hosted first-use definitions may exist before a Valiterm canonical. When both exist, prefer citing the canonical URI and acknowledge the first-use page as provenance.
